  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.lwjgl.system.Pointer

    public class NkChart
extends org.lwjgl.system.Struct

    Layout

    struct nk_chart {
    int slot;
    float x;
    float y;
    float w;
    float h;
    struct nk_chart_slot slots[4];
}

    • Constructor Detail

      • NkChart

        public NkChart(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a NkChart instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
